name: Apes together strong
description:
Game made for Brackey's gamejam 2021.

Puzzle-platformer where you and your friend control two monkies trying to escape labratory.  Goal is to work together to solve how to get too the next room and finally to the freedom.  Game requires keyboard + controller or 2x controllers.



CONTROLS (Controls shown with Keyboard and Playstation 4 controller):
Move: WASD / Left Joystick
Jump: Space / X
Attack (Only bigger monkey): F / O
